content.html:
XLR MIC ADAPTER SETTING


Adjust microphone input channel settings and the like for use
with XLR microphone adapters.


OptionDescription
MIC INPUT CHANNELRecord four-channel (quadraphonic) sound with the help of the camera's built-in microphone, or two-channel (stereo) sound using only a microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter. 4ch XLR+CAMERA: Record four-channel sound with the help of the camera's built-in microphone. 2ch XLR ONLY: Record two-channel sound using only an external microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter.
4ch AUDIO MONITORINGChoose the source of sound output to headphones or other audio monitors during movie recording. XLR: Monitor sound from external microphones con- nected via the XLR microphone adapter. CAMERA: Monitor sound from camera's built-in mi- crophone.
HDMI 4ch AUDIO OUTPUTChoose source of audio output to the HDMI connector. XLR: Audio from external microphones connected via the XLR microphone adapter is output to the HDMI con- nector. CAMERA: Audio from camera's built-in microphone is output to the HDMI connector.

The
Shooting
Menus

If an external microphone is connected to the camera's microphone
jack, audio will be recorded not via the camera's built-in microphone
but via the external microphone instead.
● Four-channel recording is available only when MOV is selected for
movie file format.

184
content.markdown:
# XLR MIC ADAPTER SETTING

# Adjust microphone input channel settings and the like for use
with XLR microphone adapters.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| MIC INPUT CHANNEL | Record four-channel (quadraphonic) sound with the help of the camera's built-in microphone, or two-channel (stereo) sound using only a microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter. 4ch XLR+CAMERA: Record four-channel sound with the help of the camera's built-in microphone. 2ch XLR ONLY: Record two-channel sound using only an external microphone connected via the XLR microphone adapter. |
| 4ch AUDIO MONITORING | Choose the source of sound output to headphones or other audio monitors during movie recording. XLR: Monitor sound from external microphones con- nected via the XLR microphone adapter. CAMERA: Monitor sound from camera's built-in mi- crophone. |
| HDMI 4ch AUDIO OUTPUT | Choose source of audio output to the HDMI connector. XLR: Audio from external microphones connected via the XLR microphone adapter is output to the HDMI con- nector. CAMERA: Audio from camera's built-in microphone is output to the HDMI connector. |


The
Shooting
Menus

- If an external microphone is connected to the camera's microphone
- jack, audio will be recorded not via the camera's built-in microphone
- but via the external microphone instead.
- ● Four-channel recording is available only when MOV is selected for
- movie file format.


184

If an external microphone is connected to the camera's microphone
jack, audio will be recorded not via the camera's built-in microphone
but via the external microphone instead.
● Four-channel recording is available only when MOV is selected for
movie file format.
content.markdown:
- If an external microphone is connected to the camera's microphone
- jack, audio will be recorded not via the camera's built-in microphone
- but via the external microphone instead.
- ● Four-channel recording is available only when MOV is selected for
- movie file format.
